Rukmini Maitra Age | Height | Boyfriend | Wiki | Biography | Movie | Photo

Bolly Reporter | December 19, 2019May 27, 2019 | Bengali Actress

Rukmini Maitra (রুক্মিনী মৈত্র) is an Indian Model and Actress from Kolkata, who has worked as a model for various regional, national and international brands and magazines. After having established herself in the world of fashion, Rukmini made her silver screen debut in 2017.

Biography & Wiki

Rukmini Maitra’s Nickname is Rukmini. She was born on born on 27 June 1991 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 28 years. Rukmini’s Zodiac is Cancer.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Height in Centimeters170 cm
Height in meters1.70 m
Height in Inches5′ 7″
Weight in Kilograms55 Kg
Weight in Pounds120 lbs
Hair ColorBlack
Body measurement32-23-34 inches
Eye colorBrown
Body shapeHourglass
Shoe size8

Family Members

Rukmini’s father’s name is Late Soumyendra Nath Maitra, who is an IIM Gold Medalist. Her mother’s name is Mrs. Madhumita Maitra. She has an elder brother named Rahul Maitra.

Education and School, College

Rukmini did her schooling from Carmel Convent School, Kolkata. After that, she went to Loreto College, Kolkata to complete her graduation. Finally, she went to IIM Kozhikode, Calicut, Kerala to complete her MBA.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

Rukmini is in a serious relationship with Bengali superstar Dev Adhikari. She has a tattoo on her left wrist which says “Dev”.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Favorite ColorRed, Blue, Pink
Favorite BrandGucci

Rukmini Maitra filmography

Rukmini started her career as a model at the age of 13. She is the brand ambassador of many pronounced brands and magazines such as Reliance, Lakmé, Vodafone, Sunsilk, Parachute, Titan, etc. She has also worked for some famous fashion designers like Masaba Gupta, Anita Dongre, Suneet Varma, Dev r Nil, Anju Modi, etc.

Rukmini Maitra started her acting career with Bengali film titled “Champ” opposite Bengali Superstar Dev which was released in Eid 2017. The film was directed by Raj Chakraborty. The story of the film is based on boxing. Her latest movie is Kabir which is an Indian Bengali-language film, directed by Aniket Chattopadhyay and released on 13 April 2018.

Awards & Recognitions

  • Rukmini won Calcutta Times Most Desirable Woman of 2017 award by the Times of India
  • She got Jio Filmfare Award, for Best Debut (Female) for the films Chaamp and Cockpit in 2018
  • In 2018, she won Bengal Film Journalists’ Award for Most Promising Actress

Salary and Net Worth

Rukmini has an estimated net worth of almost $3 Million. She earns almost ₹15 1o ₹20 lakhs for every movie she plays as salary.

Contact Address

House AddressKolkata, West Bengal, India
Phone NumberShe didn’t like to share her Phone number publicly.
Email IdNot Available

Facts about Rukmini Maitra

  • Maitra started her career as a model when she was 13 years old.
  • Her grandfather, BN Maitra, was eminent Chief Justice
  • In her school days, she wanted to be a lawyer.
  • Rukmini has walked the ramp for fashion shows like “Shaadi By Marriott” and “Bengal Fashion Week.”
  • Rukmini shares a great bond with her niece, Amira. She keeps posting pictures with Amira on her Instagram account.
  • Rukmini revealed during an interview that she was offered the lead role in the Bollywood film “Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi.” But, she declined the offer as she was in class XI at that time.
